mapper.select: SELECT orderId, u_Id, orderRec, u_Addr1, u_Addr2, u_Addr3, orderPhon, amount, orderDate, delivery FROM tbl_order order by orderId DESC

SELECT o.orderId, o.u_Id, o.orderRec, o.u_Addr1, o.u_Addr2, o.u_Addr3, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.delivery, d.orderDetailsNum, d.g_no, d.cartStock, g.g_name, g.g_thum, g_price FROM tbl_order o INNER JOIN tbl_order_details d ON o.orderId = d.orderId INNER JOIN goods g ON d.g_no = g.g_no WHERE o.orderId = #{orderId}
SELECT orderId, g_no, cartStock FROM tbl_order_details WHERE orderId = #{orderId}
SELECT r.g_no, r.u_Id, r.reNum, r.reCon, r.reDate, u.u_id, g.g_name FROM g_reply r INNER JOIN user u ON r.u_Id = u.u_id INNER JOIN goods g ON r.g_no = g.g_no ORDER BY g.g_no DESC
